name: Pop Ninja
description:
Hone your tapping and reaction skills with this challenging time killer!
What level can you get to?

The game is simple:
▶ Pop all the circles in order before the time runs out to clear the level.
▶ The faster you clear the level, the more time for the next one.
▶ The number of circles increases each level!

Easy to play but tough to reach the high levels.
Improve your mental reaction speed.

How fast can you tap?
How far can you go?
Are you faster than your friends?

Only one way to find out.
